description.narrative: Funding under this initiative will support a mission to develop a Concept Document to assess the feasibility of future assistance to the Natural Resource Management Sector, following the completion of the Sri Lanka Australia Natural Resource Management Project (SLANRMP) in Sri Lanka (2003-2009). The goal of SLANRMP is to contribute to poverty reduction through improved natural resource management in the dry and intermediate zones of Sri Lanka, to assist the Forest Department and other agencies involved in natural resource management to develop and implement policy, legislation and practice to work with local communities in participatory management of dry and intermediate zone forests and other natural resources. The total value of this initiative is $0.2 million over 2 years, starting 2008-09.
